name: Womb
description:
During a route next to Prasinos, a colonized little planet, Helena received the a order to investigate a S.O.S. sign streamed by the mothership Z9. When landing on site, she discovers an accident that resulted in the escape of specimens used in studies and she finds herself isolated on a facility surrounded by threats. Unable to retake contact with the HQ from inside the Z9, Helena will need find a way to the nearest base so she can communicate with her fellows.

Inspired by the 16-bit era, this is a side-scrolling action-platform game that offers different challenges at each unlocked level. Run through the shadows of an enemy-infested ship, make your way through an alien flora and survive the dangers of lava filled caves in a world inhabited by creatures from another planet. Handcrafted pixel art sprites, animated frame by frame and a overworld so you can navigate between the levels.

Remember the experience of living a story with a beginning, middle and end while jump through platforms, fighting different enemies and bosses.

Features:
• Challenges involving platforms, traps and enemies.
• Bosses with different strategies.
• Alternate between different kinds of shot according with the need of each challenge.
• Overworld connecting the levels so that you can navigate between them ass you progress.
• Original soundtrack.
